raw akas.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series

akas: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (original title)
The Fridge: Una brutta WebSerie (alternative title)
akas from release info: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (original title)
The Fridge: Una brutta WebSerie (alternative title)

1.title: Beginning

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

1.plot: Valants is looking for a cucumber inside the fridge in order to make a burger, but a misunderstanding with Radio will soon change his plans.

2.title: Philosophy

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

2.plot: Radio tells to Valants his willing to go back to University and study philosophy, even if he's almost 30.

3.title: Punch

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

3.plot: Radio tells to Valants about the fight he had with a British guy just a few minutes before.

4.title: Tinder

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

4.plot: Valants and Radio discuss about "Tinder". A popular dating App.

5.title: Mime

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

5.plot: Radio is training himself for his audition for a Mime role in Central London.

6.title: Jogging

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

6.plot: Valants is late for his afternoon at the gym and asks help to Radio.

7.title: Vegan

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

7.plot: Radio decides to become Vegan and tells the news to Valants who's a little bit disappointed.

8.title: IELTS

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

8.plot: Radio is studying for the imminent test IELTS and asks Valants to help him with some translations.

9.title: Fridge Manager

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

9.plot: Valants finally found a new job in a restaurant and discusses with Radio about his future role.

10.title: Uber

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

10.plot: Radio is trying to find network with his phone in order to call a Uber and Valants decides to help him with a little trick.

11.title: Blonde

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

11.plot: Valants is drinking in order to forget his love for a blonde girl from his old town. But Radio has got a fantastic idea to help him forget her.

12.title: Birthday

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

12.plot: Radio is ready to celebrate Valants's birthday, but unfortunately for him, he's 9 months late.

13.title: James

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

13.plot: Radio shows up with a new t-shirt and tells to Valants how he stole it from one of his best friends.

14.title: Netflix

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

14.plot: Valants is spending his free time at home because he's obsessed with TV series and Movies on streaming, so Radio decides to convince him to go out.

15.title: Youtuber

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

15.plot: Radio is tired of being unemployed so he decides to start a career as a Youtuber, but Valants it's not sure about this choice.

16.title: Maronno

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

16.plot: Valants is dressed up as a popular Italian character: Padre Maronno. He believes he will win the fancy dress competition in a party he's going to, but Radio doesn't seems to agree.

17.title: Rent

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

17.plot: Valants and Radio are shocked by the previous call they received from their landlord asking for the rent, and try to figure out how to pay.

18.title: Cyclist

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

18.plot: Valants comes back home with a bicycle, and remembers with Radio the time he was a delivery guy.

19.title: Beard

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

19.plot: Radio is shaving his beard in front of the fridge because the mirror in the bathroom is broken; meanwhile, Valants is looking for his favourite Mayo.

20.title: Finale

episode of.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series (TV Series 2017–2018)

20.plot: A black out puts an end to the Fridge's life; what Radio and Valants are going to do now?

imdb.title: The Fridge: An Ugly Web Series
plot: Two young guys discuss about their low-budget life, embarrassing events, sentimental interests, and today's society problems, during the most important moment of the day: when we open the fridge in order to choose what to eat.::Matteo Valentini
